mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,SEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,NAME,REGDATE,BEST,CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY SEQ DESC))
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ =#{seq}
UPDATE BOARD SET CNT=CNT+1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}

choose.when: WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE RNUM>=#{startIndex} AND RNUM<=#{cntPerPage} AND( NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
choose.otherwise: WHERE RNUM>=#{startIndex} AND RNUM<=#{cntPerPage} AND(${searchOption} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
